SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.model.domain.statistics

Schnittstelle StatisticStrategy<T>

Typparameter:
T - The type of the result produced by the strategy.
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
ActorRatingsStrategy, GenreCountStrategy, GenreRatingsStrategy, ImdbRatingAverageStrategy, MyRatingAverageStrategy, PercentageRatingDifferenceStrategy, StateCountStrategy, TypeCountStrategy
public interface StatisticStrategy<T>
A generic interface for implementing strategies to calculate statistics based on a list of cinematics and filtering criteria.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    T
    calculate(List<Cinematic> cinematics, List<Type> types, List<State> states)
    Calculates a statistic based on the provided list of cinematics and filtering criteria.

  • Methodendetails

    • calculate

      T calculate(List<Cinematic> cinematics, List<Type> types, List<State> states)
      Calculates a statistic based on the provided list of cinematics and filtering criteria.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - The list of cinematics to be analyzed.
      types - The types of cinematics to include in the calculation (e.g., Movie, Series, Anime).
      states - The states of cinematics to include (e.g., Watched, ToWatch, Dropped).
      Gibt zurück:
      The result of the statistic calculation, represented as an object of type T.
